pr_title: KYLIN-4625 Debug the code of Kylin on Parquet without hadoop environment

timeline.message: KYLIN-4625 Debug the code of Kylin on Parquet without hadoop environment

timeline.bodyText: UT is unittest, but local is local. So isLocalEnv()?
timeline.author: bigxiaochu

timeline.bodyText:
why ut path is "../../examples/test_case_data/parquet_test/data/", but local path is  "../parquet_test/data/"?
can they use same path?
timeline.author: bigxiaochu

replies.bodyText: Agreed, these two path confusing me too.
replies.author: hit-lacus
